component.name: @DEV2
component.content: Compilation reminder, this sub-item is a prompt, not a configuration item

children.name: @comment_1
children.content: If you need to be compatible with V1103's flash layout, please set the script area size to 448k

children.name: @comment_2
children.content: If TTS resources are configured to be stored in the Modules, the script area will be forcibly set to 64k

children.name: @comment_3
children.content: Normal compilation takes no more than 2 minutes. If you have any questions, please go to https://gitee.com/openLuat/LuatOS/issues to provide feedback, or ask FAE for help.

children.name: @comment_4
children.content: Only firmware with the same script area size can perform underlying OTA. Be sure to pay attention.

children.name: @comment_5
children.content: What is shown is the estimated size. It is an estimate! An estimate! An estimate! The actual compilation is successful and it can be accommodated.

children.name: @comment_7
children.content: It is estimated that the red color may not be compiled, and the green color represents a high probability of compilation. If the actual compilation is successful, it can be put down!

children.name: @comment_6
children.content: Lua basic library and network basic library (socket/http/mqtt) are all enabled by default and have no configuration items.

children.name: soft_uart
children.content: Soft serial port support, baud rate 9600 or below, any 2 GPIO, only supports one channel

children.name: crypto
children.content: Encryption and decryption algorithm, md5/sha family/aes/des/crc series

children.name: mcu
children.content: MCU proprietary API to obtain unique id and tick clock count

children.name: pm
children.content: Power consumption management, sleep mode control, scheduled wake-up

children.name: otp
children.content: Once locked, it cannot be modified or erased. Even if the Flash is cleared, it cannot be modified.

children.name: media
children.content: Multimedia, currently only audio, supports playing amr/mp3. Contains audio and codec libraries

children.name: sms
children.content: For sending and receiving text messages, the Modules cannot send and receive text messages when the telecommunications card is inserted into it.

children.name: wlan
children.content: wlan scanning function. Only supports scanning and does not support wifi communication!!

component.name: @tts
component.content: TTS=offline text-to-speech, media needs to be enabled, occupies 200k

children.name: tts
children.content: Enable TTS main function, the function itself accounts for 200k. The default is to plug-in SPI Flash to store TTS resources

children.name: @tts_comment
children.content: TTS resources are very large, and there are two configurations: external SPI Flash and direct placement in the Modules. The former is the default.

children.name: tts_onchip
children.content: Putting TTS resources directly in the Modules requires 750k Flash. Pay attention to the trade-offs of other libraries, otherwise it will not be able to be placed.

children.name: tts_only
children.content: Disable AMR/MP3 decoding and only integrate TTS playback function to save space

children.name: @tts_8k
children.content: [Abandoned, do not select] Use 8k TTS resources, the sound quality is slightly worse than 16k

children.name: @tts_16k
children.content: Choose 16k TTS resource, the default is also 16k, the sound quality is slightly better

children.name: iotauth
children.content: Cloud service authentication key generation, Alibaba Cloud/Tencent Cloud/Baidu Cloud/Huawei Cloud/Tuya, etc.

children.name: pack
children.content: Data packaging and unpacking, especially binary data unpacking and packaging

children.name: libgnss
children.content: NMEA analysis, analysis of GNSS/GPS data

children.name: fdb
children.content: [Not recommended] kv database, it will not be lost after power failure. It is recommended to use fskv library instead.

children.name: fskv
children.content: [Recommended] kv database, instead of fdb, recommended

children.name: miniz
children.content: Compression and decompression library, compatible with zlib format

children.name: fastlz
children.content: Another LZ compression and decompression library, the memory requirements for compression are smaller than miniz

children.name: sfud
children.content: Universal spi flash driver library, supported by common spi flash on the market

children.name: rsa
children.content: RSA encryption and decryption, signature verification, does not rely on crypto libraries

children.name: statem
children.content: State machine, can output GPIO sequence

children.name: ir
children.content: IR infrared transmit/receive, currently only supports sending

children.name: @rev_master_comment1
children.content: This section selects the code version. By default, the latest code of the code base is selected, that is, the latest code of the master branch.

children.name: @rev_master_select
children.content: Use the latest code of the code base, that is, the latest code of the master branch

children.name: @rev_release_v1110
children.content: Select the code of the V1110 release version for compilation, release date 2024.6.7

children.name: @rev_release_v1109
children.content: Select the code of the V1109 release version for compilation, release date 2024.3.6

children.name: @rev_release_v1108
children.content: Select the code of the V1108 release version for compilation, release date 2023.10.31

children.name: @rev_release_v1107
children.content: Select the code of the V1107 release version for compilation, release date 2023.7.11

children.name: @master123
children.content: The configuration in this section has certain risks, please choose carefully.

children.name: LUAT_UART0_FORCE_USER
children.content: Release UART0 for user use. The underlying log cannot be read from UART0, and the log can only be read through USB.

children.name: LUAT_UART0_FORCE_ALT1
children.content: Switch UART0 to another multiplexer, paddr 31/32

children.name: LUAT_GPIO_1415_ALT0
children.content: [Abandoned, unavailable] GPIO14/15 is forcibly allocated to the position of UART0, paddr 29/30, needs to turn on LUAT_UART0_FORCE_ALT1

children.name: LUAT_UART0_LOG_BR_12M
children.content: The baud rate of UART0 output log is 12M

children.name: LUAT_HEAP_SIZE_200K
children.content: Lua memory is set to 200k bytes. The default is 200k before 2023.7.10, and the default is 256k after that. This option is only for compatibility with old configurations. It does not affect FOTA

children.name: LUAT_HEAP_SIZE_300K
children.content: Lua memory is set to 300k bytes. In this mode, the audio library cannot be used, and the number of TLS connections needs to be limited to less than 2.

children.name: LUAT_HEAP_SIZE_324K
children.content: Lua memory is set to 324k bytes. In this mode, the audio library cannot be used, and the number of TLS connections needs to be limited to less than 2.

children.name: rndis
children.content: Enable RNDIS network card, Lua memory will be forcibly reduced to 160k

children.name: tls_disable
children.content: Completely disabling the TLS/SSL function can save 110k flash consumption and related encrypted communications will be unavailable.

children.name: LUAT_CONF_TLS_DTLS_DISABLE
children.content: Disable the encrypted version of UDP communication, which is similar to TCP's SSL/TLS. It is not used in 99% of scenarios.

children.name: LUAT_CONF_TLS_DISABLE_NC
children.content: Disable GCM/DHM/DES/PKCS1_V21 and other algorithms, which are not used in 99% of scenarios

children.name: LUAT_CONF_TLS_SHA512_DISABLE
children.content: Disable the SHA512 algorithm, which is not used in 99% of scenarios

children.name: LUAT_CONF_TLS_DISABLE_ECP_ECDHE
children.content: Disabling the elliptical algorithm can accelerate https websites that are compatible with elliptical and AES

children.name: LUAT_CONF_FONTS_OLD_STYLE
children.content: Use the old U8G2 font file so that when the old version is differentially upgraded, the differential package size will not exceed the standard. New users should not choose this option!!!

children.name: tjpgd
children.content: Supports JPG images, decoding requires the same memory as the image size

children.name: @lvgl
children.content: A lightweight graphical library that relies on the LCD library. Although it is supported, SPI is slow and the effect is not good.

children.name: @u8g2_fonts
children.content: Universal font, suitable for u8g2/disp/eink/lcd library

children.name: @fonts_comment1
children.content: Starting from V1110, the font data of the U8G2 library has been updated. If there is a differential upgrade from a version before V1110 to a version V1110 or above, please pay attention to the size of the differential package.

children.name: @fonts_comment2
children.content: In the advanced options, there is a configuration item to select the font data of the old version. It is only available to users who have differential upgrades to the above-mentioned lower versions. New users do not need to pay attention.

children.name: USE_U8G2_SARASA_ENGLISH
children.content: Monospace font English font and special symbols

children.name: USE_U8G2_SARASA_M8_CHINESE
children.content: 8pix constant width Chinese font, use lcd.font_sarasa_m8_chinese when calling

children.name: USE_U8G2_SARASA_M12_CHINESE
children.content: 12pix fixed-width Chinese font, similarly, u8g2.font_sarasa_m12_chinese is also available

children.name: USE_U8G2_OPPOSANSM8_CHINESE
children.content: 8pix Chinese font, use lcd.font_opposansm8_chinese when calling

children.name: USE_U8G2_OPPOSANSM12_CHINESE
children.content: 12pix Chinese font, similarly, u8g2.font_opposansm12_chinese is also available

children.name: gtfont
children.content: Qualcomm vector font (requires Qualcomm font chip)

children.name: gtfont_utf8
children.content: Qualcomm vector fonts support UTF-8 encoding (180k transcoding table)

component.name: @ADD123
component.content: Infrequently used libraries, generally not used

children.name: mqttcore
children.content: The MQTT protocol parsing library does not contain links and does not rely on the mqtt library. It has no impact on daily mqtt communication.

children.name: libcoap
children.content: COAP protocol parsing library, only contains protocol parsing and synthesis

children.name: ercoap
children.content: New version of COAP protocol library

children.name: antbot
children.content: Ant Chain is provided by Ant Group. You need to contact Ant Group to obtain the official token.

children.name: ulwip
children.content: [Under testing] User layer lwip integration, currently used for docking of air601, w5200

children.name: napt
children.content: [Under testing] Network address port conversion, using ulwip library to implement router function

children.name: sqlite3
children.content: Sqlite3 database stores the database in the file system, and the data is slow. It is only recommended to try it out in scenarios with a small amount of data.
